name: An Artist at Work
description:
'An Artist at Work' (2018) was made for Pizza Jam IV, and was inspired by the deadly sin of Sloth.

AAW explores the moralistic relevance of the so-called 'deadly' sins through the use of revolutionary hands-free eye-tracking software that ensures the user can engage with the work at their own pace.

Lead Level Designer and co-writer on the project Evan Yvonne explains how AAW 'is a reflection of [his] personal journey exploring the true nature of creativity', in the companion documentary 'At Work: An Artist', to be released Q1 2019.

Critics are saying AAW 'is', 'was', and 'will be' a real contender in this year's competition; download now and find out for yourself.
